ygData.subject: WARNING OOC. Doesn't really concern anyone it is a reply to one of dewboys mails
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, First of all if you dont want to read an OOC post styop reading now and go to the next IC message. I gave you warning in the subject line too. No... you

Subject: WARNING OOC. Doesn't really concern anyone it is a reply to one of dewboys mails

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Ok, First of all if you dont want to read an OOC post styop reading now and 
go to the next IC message. I gave you warning in the subject line too.

No... you cant do two things at once. You never posted for mustex leaving to 
anywhere or arriving anywhere. Or getting the Hover Cycles anywhere. Yan told 
you earlier about having to post for every action taken. And it is in the 
rules. If you dont know the rules will be glad to supply you with a link in 
this mail and c/p the rule in which it says you must post for leaving and 
arriving in an area. Heh this should actually save the council and Yan some 
trouble since Yan is really busy anyways.

Link: http://www.nbwrpg.com/rules.shtml

Now for the traveling rule as well as some other rules I believe you are not 
aware of:

#1 Do not manage other people's characters in any way, shape, or form. This 
means that you cannot control them, post damage for them, etc.


#8 Do not go vast distances in one post. If you're going from South Africa to 
Europe, post your char leaving, and in about half a day or so, post him/her 
arriving.

#9
The following weapons are banned. If you wish to bring in new/original 
weapons, get them authorized by the council. You may not have any of the 
following under any condition: 
any sort of seeking missiles 
shockwaves and EMP shots 
flare bombs/flash grenades 
Weaponry that defies shields of bases and ships
(This one I got hit with but its my fault for not following this rule in the 
first place, which reminds me I need to edit some bios...)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Well I hoped this mail helped you dewboy and I hoped it helped the council as 
well since they don't need to state the rules a billionth time since I just 
gave you a link to them. Unless of course you violate the rules.

--part1_32.189ad256.28987e7a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
